title: Biden Pitches Economy to a Skeptical Public in New Mexico
description: The president argued that low unemployment, new health care cost curbs and falling gas prices are benefiting Americans while Republicans would make the economy worse.
dc:creator: Peter Baker

media:content.media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: President Bidenâ€™s stop in New Mexico opened a five-day swing that will also take him to California, Illinois, Pennsylvania, Delaware, New York and Maryland by Election Day.
